original_title: Obamaland Part 1: Rise of the Trumpublikans
overview: In 2017, in the wake of the newly-elected President Trump's mysterious tragic fall from the balcony of Trump Tower, Barack Obama declares himself "President-For-Life". Now, in 2040, in a gunless, godless America renamed "Obamaland", a ragtag group of patriotic "Trumpublikans" plot from an abandoned Applecheez deep in the Heartland to take their country back once and for all
title: Obamaland Part 1: Rise of the Trumpublikans
